word_mean: half-power point 在谐振电路中，其功率为最大功率的一半(即电流为最大电流的0.707倍)时的频率。
half-cell 一个导电体(如金属)同离子导体(如电解质溶液)连接构成的系统。
half-value layer 能将已知射线强度减弱一半的某种物质的厚度。
fresh fish product 用少量食盐短期保藏的鲜鱼品。
salted refreshment 用少量食盐短期保藏新鲜鱼品的一种方法。

sentence.Network_en: Elliott crossed the finish line just half a second behind his adversary.
sentence.Network_cn: 埃利奥特跨过终点线时仅比对手落后半秒钟。

sentence.Network_en: She'd half expected him to withdraw from the course.
sentence.Network_cn: 她多少已经预料到他会中途就退出这门课程。

sentence.Network_en: The French, who led 21-3 at half time, scored eight tries.
sentence.Network_cn: 上半场以21：3领先的法国队有8个达阵得分。

jx.jx_en_mean: (informal)used to indicate that one considers a particular person or thing to be an impressive example of their kind
jx.jx_cn_mean: (非正式)非常出色的，非一般的，典范的

lj.lj_ly: Aunt Edie was a woman and a half.
lj.lj_ls: 伊迪姑姑是女人中的典范。

lj.lj_ly: Aunt Edie was a woman and a half.
lj.lj_ls: 伊迪姑姑是女人中的典范。

lj.lj_ly: Aunt Edie was a woman and a half.
lj.lj_ls: 伊迪姑姑是女人中的典范。

jx.jx_cn_mean: (非正式)一点点机会，很小的机会

lj.lj_ly: given half a chance he can make anything work.
lj.lj_ls: 只要给他一点点机会，他什么都可以做到。

lj.lj_ly: given half a chance he can make anything work.
lj.lj_ls: 只要给他一点点机会，他什么都可以做到。

jx.jx_en_mean: [usu. with negative](informal)the most important part or aspect of something
jx.jx_cn_mean: (非正式)最重要的一部分（或一方面）

lj.lj_ly: you don't know the half of it.
lj.lj_ls: 你还不了解最重要的情况。

thirty minutes after one (two, etc.) o'clock

jx.jx_cn_mean: 彻底地做事情；大肆铺张地做事情

lj.lj_ly: the idea seems too superstitious by half.
lj.lj_ls: 这个想法似乎过于迷信。

jx.jx_cn_mean: 不热情地：采取一种勉强的态度；不热情地

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English half, healf, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch half and German halb (adjectives). The earliest meaning of the Germanic base was 'side', also a noun sense in Old English

entry.def: Half of an amount or object is one of two equal parts that together make up the whole number, amount, or object.

example.ex: They need an extra two and a half thousand pounds to complete the project...
example.tran: 他们还需要2,500英镑才能完成该项目。

example.ex: More than half of all households report incomes above £35,000...
example.tran: 半数以上的家庭申报收入超过35,000英镑。

entry.tran: 部分地;在某种程度上;有点
entry.def: You use half to say that something is only partly the case or happens to only a limited extent.

example.ex: His eyes were half closed...
example.tran: 他双眼半闭。

example.ex: His refrigerator frequently looked half empty...
example.tran: 他的冰箱里经常半空着。

entry.tran: （足球、橄榄球、篮球比赛等的）半场，半时，半局
entry.def: In games such as football, rugby, and basketball, matches are divided into two equal periods of time which are called halves.

example.ex: The only goal was scored by Jakobsen early in the second half.
example.tran: 唯一的一粒进球是由雅各布森在下半场刚开始时打进的。

entry.def: A half is half a pint of a drink such as beer or cider.

example.ex: ...a half of lager and a sandwich.
example.tran: 半品脱淡啤酒和一份三明治

entry.tran: (儿童乘坐公共汽车或火车时的）半（价）票
entry.def: A half is a half-price bus or train ticket for a child.
You use half to say that someone has parents of different nationalities. For example, if you are half German, one of your parents is German but the other is not.

example.ex: She was half Italian and half English.
example.tran: 她是半意大利半英国血统。

entry.def: You use half past to refer to a time that is thirty minutes after a particular hour.

example.ex: 'What time were you planning lunch?'—'Half past twelve, if that's convenient.'...
example.tran: “你打算什么时候吃午饭？”“如果方便的话，12点半。”

example.ex: I think I got there about four and left about half past.
example.tran: 我想我是4点钟左右到达那里，大约半个小时后离开的。

entry.def: Half means the same as half past .

example.ex: They are supposed to be here at about half four.
example.tran: 他们应该在4点半左右到达这里。

entry.tran: （用于形容词前，表示强调或夸张）非常，极其
entry.def: You can use half before an adjective describing an extreme quality, as a way of emphasizing and exaggerating something.

example.ex: He felt half dead with tiredness...
example.tran: 他已经累得半死不活了。

example.ex: All this time I've been half sick about you and why you wouldn't write.
example.tran: 我一直非常担心你，一直在想你为什么不来信。

entry.tran: （有时用在否定句中，表示非常肯定的意思）
entry.def: Half is sometimes used in negative statements, with a positive meaning, to emphasize a particular fact or quality. For example, if you say 'he isn't half lucky', you mean that he is very lucky.

example.ex: You don't half sound confident...
example.tran: 你听起来非常有信心。

example.ex: I didn't half get into trouble...
example.tran: 我遇到了大麻烦。

entry.def: You use not half or not half as to show that you do not think something is as good or impressive as it is meant to be.

example.ex: You're not half the man you think you are...
example.tran: 你根本不是你自己想象的那种人。

example.ex: Poor old Henry, and not half as clever as he'd thought.
example.tran: 可怜的老亨利，以为自己多聪明。

entry.tran: 非常…的;更…的;非同寻常的
entry.def: When you use an expression such as a problem and a half or a meal and a half, you are emphasizing that your reaction to it is either very favourable or very unfavourable.

example.ex: It becomes clear that Montgomerie has a job and half on his hands.
example.tran: 很显然，蒙哥马利手头有一大堆事情要做。

entry.def: If you talk about your better half or your other half you mean your wife, your husband, or the person of the opposite sex that you live with.

example.ex: I was worried that my career, my children and my other half might become too much to cope with.
example.tran: 我担心我的事业、我的孩子们和我的那口子可能会让我应付不过来。

entry.def: If you increase something by half, half of the original amount is added to it. If you decrease it by half, half of the original amount is taken away from it.

example.ex: The number of 7 year olds who read poorly has increased by half over the past 5 years...
example.tran: 不识字的7岁儿童的人数在过去5年里增加了一半。

example.ex: Cutting food intake by half is an incredibly difficult thing for anyone to do.
example.tran: 将进食量减半对任何人来说都是件非常难的事。

entry.def: If you say that someone never does things by halves, you mean that they always do things very thoroughly.

example.ex: In Italy they rarely do things by halves. Designers work thoroughly, producing the world's most wearable clothes in the most beautiful fabrics.
example.tran: 在意大利，人们很少马虎从事。设计师们精益求精，用最美丽的布料制造出世界上最适合穿着的衣服。

entry.def: If two people go halves, they divide the cost of something equally between them.

example.ex: He's constantly on the phone to his girlfriend. We have to go halves on the phone bill which drives me mad.
example.tran: 他总和女友煲电话粥。令我抓狂的是电话费可是我们俩平摊的。

means.word_mean: 1. one of two equal parts of a divisible whole;
2. in various games or performances: either of two periods of play separated by an interval
1. consisting of one of two equivalent parts in value or quantity;
3. (of siblings) related through one parent only;
1. partially or to the extent of a half;

sentences.sentence: "he was half hidden by the bushes"

list.explanation: 另一半人的生活如何(指另一半是穷人或富人)

example.en: Now I am beginning to understand how the other half lives.
example.zh: 如今我正在开始了解另外一半人的生活如何。

list.explanation: 处于半昏迷状态的，不省人事的

example.en: I was half under and could hear what the doctor was saying.
example.zh: 那时我处于半昏迷状态，还能听到医生在说些什么。

example.en: He was half under when they pulled him out.
example.zh: 他们把他拽出来时，他已不省人事了。

example.en: Poor Fred was half under and still had to give a speech.
example.zh: 可怜的弗雷德已经有点醉怠了，但他还是不得不发一次言。

auth_sentence.content: The second half was all about composure and patience.
auth_sentence.res_content: The second half was all about composure and patience.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The second half was all about composure and patience.

auth_sentence.content: The second half of extra time gets under way.
auth_sentence.res_content: The second half of extra time gets under way.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The second half of extra time gets under way.

auth_sentence.content: Half of Merthyr were in Italy, it seemed.
auth_sentence.res_content: Half of Merthyr were in Italy, it seemed.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Half of Merthyr were in Italy, it seemed.

Sentence.sentence: Central heating was present in every upper-and middle-class home by the second half of the 19th century.
The closest that Herpin came to resting was to sit in a rocking chair and read a half dozen newspapers.
Half a century later GM is a typical example of poor management
More than half of them were involved in inheritance disputes.

Each burning season in the Amazon, fires deliberately set by frontier settlers and developers hurl up almost half a billion metric tons of carbon a year, placing Brazil among the top five contributors to greenhouse gases in the world.
The illness is dangerous, because it is involved in half of all automobile accidents.

sentences.en: Half the apples are bad.
sentences.cn: 这些苹果有一半是坏的。

sentences.en: They stood in half a circle.
sentences.cn: 他们站成半圆形。

sentences.en: A half truth is often no better than a lie.
sentences.cn: 半真半假的话不见得比说谎要好。

sentences.en: Half knowledge of anything is dangerous.
sentences.cn: 对任何东西一知半解都是危险的。

sentences.en: My home is half a kilometre away from here.
sentences.cn: 我家离这儿有半公里。

sentences.en: He went out at half nine.
sentences.cn: 他九点半出门。

sentences.en: I met him half an hour ago.
sentences.cn: 我半小时前碰到他。

sentences.en: Cut the apple into halves.
sentences.cn: 把这个苹果切成两半。

sentences.en: He's in the bottom half of the class.
sentences.cn: 他在班上的名次位于后一半。

sentences.en: Railway fares are reduced by half for children.
sentences.cn: 铁路旅费对儿童减半。

sentences.en: Half of ten is five.
sentences.cn: 十的一半是五。

sentences.en: Half of the apples are unripe.
sentences.cn: 一半的苹果不熟。

sentences.en: Half of them are gone.
sentences.cn: 他们之中的一半人走了。

sentences.en: Only half of us came last Tuesday.
sentences.cn: 上星期二我们只有一半人来了。

sentences.en: She gave me half, and kept the other half for her husband.
sentences.cn: 她给了我一半, 把另一半留给她的丈夫了。

sentences.en: He was half under the bed, with his legs sticking out.
sentences.cn: 他一半身子在床上, 腿伸在外面。

sentences.en: My work is not half done yet.
sentences.cn: 我的工作还没做完一半呢。

sentences.en: These potatoes are only half cooked.
sentences.cn: 这些土豆煮得半生不熟。

sentences.en: We were driving half when the car broke down.
sentences.cn: 当汽车抛锚时, 我们正行驶了一半的路程。

sentences.en: She was half laughing, half crying.
sentences.cn: 她半哭半笑。

sentences.en: Oh, I'm half dead.
sentences.cn: 哦, 我快累死了。

sentences.en: The boy was half dead from hunger.
sentences.cn: 那男孩由于饥饿已经半死不活的了。

jushi.english: I met him half an hour ago.
He went out at half nine.
Half knowledge of anything is dangerous.
jushi.chinese: 对任何东西一知半解都是危险的。
